string.value: Counterattack|Commonwealth of Independent Towns, call sign “Chaser”|Nisia|May 25, 2265, 0723
Mission objectives:|Destroy armored vehicles and patrol boats of the Crimson Dawn at Kane's island. Retreat before the arrival of enemy reinforcements after the main objective is completed.
Secondary objectives:|Finish the mission without losses of vehicles; destroy the enemy reinforcements.
Primary mission objectives completed. Hostile presence near the player is absent.|Do you wish to end the mission?
